thread.section_title: Westminster Underground closed as ‘terror attack’ on Parliament leaves area on lockdown – Metro
thread.title: Westminster Underground closed as ‘terror attack’ on Parliament leaves area on lockdown
thread.title_full: Westminster Underground closed as ‘terror attack’ on Parliament leaves area on lockdown

author: Jen
title: Westminster Underground closed as ‘terror attack’ on Parliament leaves area on lockdown
text:
The area is on lockdown (Picture: EPA/ANDY RAIN) Westminster Underground Station has been closed as police create a ‘sterile zone’ around Parliament following what is being treated as a terror attack. 
Trains will still go through the station, but will not be stopping.
People travelling home tonight are advised to avoid roads around the area and find alternative routes home.
A cordon is in place around Parliament, with people working in the vicinity told to stay away from windows as a precaution.
There are reports of many injured after a car drove into pedestrians on Westminster Bridge.
Westminster station is closed due to a Police investigation
— TfL Travel Alerts (@TfLTravelAlerts) March 22, 2017 

A police officer has been stabbed outside Parliament and police said they responded to a firearms incident.
More follows.
